entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 15 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
